alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 11:12PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Montgomery and north central Harris Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1111 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Willowbrook, or near Jersey Village, moving northeast at 15 mph. Weak rotation was noted with this storm. A severe thunderstorm or tornado warning may be required with further intensification. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tomball, Spring, The Woodlands, Splashtown, Willowbrook, Hooks Airport and Greater Inwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for southeastern Texas.
